---
title: "Books"
listing:
  contents: books
  sort: "date-added desc"
  type: default
  categories: true
  sort-ui: [title, author, date, date-added]
  filter-ui: true
  fields: [title, author, date, date-added, categories, status]
  field-types:
    date-added: date
  field-display-names:
    status: "Status"
    categories: "Topics"
    date-added: "Added"
page-layout: full
---

<style>
/* Hide date-added from display but keep it sortable */
.listing-date-added {
  display: none !important;
}

.status-filter {
  display: flex;
  gap: 0.75rem;
  margin-bottom: 2rem;
  justify-content: center;
}

.status-btn {
  padding: 0.5rem 1.5rem;
  border: 2px solid #dee2e6;
  background: white;
  color: #495057;
  border-radius: 0.5rem;
  cursor: pointer;
  font-weight: 500;
  transition: all 0.2s ease;
  font-size: 0.95rem;
}

.status-btn:hover {
  border-color: #0d6efd;
  color: #0d6efd;
  transform: translateY(-1px);
  box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(13, 110, 253, 0.15);
}

.status-btn.active {
  background: #0d6efd;
  border-color: #0d6efd;
  color: white;
  box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(13, 110, 253, 0.3);
}
</style>

<div class="status-filter">
  <button class="status-btn active" onclick="filterByStatus('all')">All</button>
  <button class="status-btn" onclick="filterByStatus('to-read')">To Read</button>
  <button class="status-btn" onclick="filterByStatus('finished')">Finished</button>
</div>

<script>
function filterByStatus(status) {
  // Update button states
  document.querySelectorAll('.status-btn').forEach(btn => {
    btn.classList.remove('active');
  });
  event.target.classList.add('active');
  
  // Use Quarto's search input to filter
  const searchInput = document.querySelector('.quarto-listing-filter input.search');
  if (searchInput) {
    if (status === 'all') {
      searchInput.value = '';
      searchInput.dispatchEvent(new Event('input', { bubbles: true }));
    } else {
      searchInput.value = status;
      searchInput.dispatchEvent(new Event('input', { bubbles: true }));
    }
  }
}
</script>

A curated collection of books worth reading.
